mapper.insert: insert into Assignment( user_id, assign_date, amount, product_id, assign_type, contactor, tel, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values( #{user.id}, #{assign_date}, #{amount}, #{product.id}, #{assign_type}, #{contactor}, #{tel}, 0, SYSDATE(), 0, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: select assignment.id id, user.id uid, user.name uname, assignment.assign_date assign_date, assignment.amount amount, product.id product, product.name name, product.pay_type payType, product.term term, assignment.assign_type assign_type, assignment.contactor contactor, assignment.tel tel, assignment.create_user createUser, assignment.create_time createTime, assignment.update_user updateUser, assignment.update_time updateTime from assignment,product,user where assignment.product_id = product.id and assignment.id = user.id

select assignment.id id, user.id uid, user.name uname, assignment.assign_date assign_date, assignment.amount amount, product.id product, product.name name, product.pay_type payType, product.term term, product.term_unit termUnit, assignment.assign_type assign_type, assignment.contactor contactor, assignment.tel tel, assignment.create_user createUser, assignment.create_time createTime, assignment.update_user updateUser, assignment.update_time updateTime from assignment,product ,user where assignment.product_id = product.id and assignment.id = user.id and user_id = #{userId}
